actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to narrow the circumstances under which an employer employing employees subject to that act may have wage differentials based on sex of the employees.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Stipulates that economic profitability to the employer cannot be the basis of a wage differential between the sexes if the Fair Labor Standards Act applies to the employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to narrow the circumstances under which an employer employing employees subject to that act may have wage differentials based on sex of the employees.
